text: (nabiyē!) kavurun (paralovadī) tamangē deviyan veta (viniścaya san̆dahā) ēkarāśī karanu labannemu yayi biya vannehuda, ovun (pāpayen ǣt vī) pariśuddhavantayin bavaṭa pat vīma piṇisa, ovunṭa oba anuturu an̆gavanu. ovunṭa (edina) udav karannekuda, ovun venuven mædihat vannekuda, ohu misa (vena kisivekut) næta
